_header: The angel said of high degree / Hail full of grace God is with thee
_description: James Ryman, ‘Alma redemptoris mater’ — thirteen quatrains including refrain, ‘Alma Redemptoris’ or ‘Redemptoris mater’, and burden: ‘Alma redemptoris mater / Quem de celis misit pater’

CULEe112.First Lines:
The angelle seide of highe degreHaile fulle of grace god is with
                    the…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…And she hath born the kyng of myghtRedemptoris
                    mater
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 286-8.
